pkgmetadata.longdescription: ODB is an open-source, cross-platform, and cross-database object-relational mapping (ORM) system for C++. It allows you to persist C++ objects to a relational database without having to deal with tables, columns, or SQL and without manually writing any mapping code. Please email bugs to odb-users@codesynthesis.com

use.flag: enforce thread support in runtime libraries
also install the odb boost support library
also install the qt support library
also install the MySQL runtime support library
also install the Microsoft SQL server runtime support library
also install the Oracle runtime support library
also install the postgreSQL runtime support library
also install the SQLite runtime support library
also install examples in doc directory
also install the well written documentation for odb
test the installation as tailored by use flag combinations before also merging odb
